name: ratio_of_ice_volume_in_frozen_ground_to_pore_volume_in_unfrozen_ground
description: The phrase "ratio_of_X_to_Y" means X/Y. "X_volume" means the volume occupied by X within the grid cell. Pore volume is the volume of the porosity of the ground under natural, unfrozen conditions. This is often known as "ice saturation index".
